department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Electromagnetic Interactions with Matter
course.description: This course will focus on how electromagnetic fields and matter interact. Deterministic, statistical, classical, and quantum mechanical considerations will be covered. The course will be useful for experimental and applied physics students in atomic, solid state, optical, chemical, and biophysics.
course.prerequisites: An advanced undergraduate course at the level of Physics 153 is required.
